flavor: "Odd that some say I am less than human, when in truth I am far superior."
name: Vision
text: Density Manipulation - Action: Change mass form by flipping your mass form upgrade over. (Limit once per round.)

name: Vision
text: While you are in Dense mass form, you get +2 REC. While you are in Intangible mass form, you get +1 hand size. Setup: Put your mass form upgrade into play, Intangible side faceup.

back_text: Mass form. Permanent. While in hero form, Vision gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF. Response: After you change to this mass form, draw 1 card.
name: Intangible
text:
Mass form. Permanent.
Vision cannot attack or defend.
Reduce the amount of damage Vision takes from each attack by 2.

name: Vivian
text:
While you are in Intangible mass form, Vivian gets +2 THW.
While you are in Dense mass form, Vivian gets +2 ATK.

flavor: "I stand forever at the crossroads of mind and heart." - Vision
name: 616 Hickory Branch Lane
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust this card → search your deck and discard pile for an [[Android]] ally and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)

flavor: The gem on Vision's brow absorbs solar energy, which his body converts into power by a process similar to photosynthesis.
name: Solar Gem
text: Vision gains the [[Aerial]] trait. Resource: Exhaust Solar Gem → generate a [wild] resource.

flavor: Vision's density control extends to his uniform and cape.
name: Vision's Cape
text:
While you are in Dense mass form, you gain retaliate 1.
While you are in Intangible mass form, you gain stalwart.

flavor: "Would it kill you to use the door?" - Hawkeye
name: Density Control
text: Hero Response: After you change mass form, discard this card → add a Vision event from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Solar Beam
text: Hero Action (attack): If Vision is in Dense mass form, deal 7 damage to an enemy. Hero Action (thwart): If Vision is in Intangible mass form, remove 5 threat from a scheme.

flavor: "I have made the calculations, and there is no outcome in which you win this fight." - Vision
name: Superdense Strike
text: Play only if Vision is in Dense mass form. Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

name: Just Passing Through
text: Play only if Vision is in Intangible mass form. Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme, ignoring the patrol keyword and the crisis icon ([crisis]).

name: Phase Disruption
text: Play only if Vision is in Intangible mass form. Hero Action: Confuse an enemy. Choose an attachment on that enemy with the text "Hero Action" or "Hero Response" and discard that attachment.

name: Mass Increase
text: Play only if Vision is in Dense mass form. Hero Interrupt (defense): When Vision defends, prevent all damage from that attack. Stun the attacking enemy after that attack resolves.

name: Jocasta
text: You may play the event attached to Jocasta as if it were in your hand. Response: After Jocasta enters play, choose a [[Defense]] event in your discard pile and attach it to her facedown.

name: Protector
text: Interrupt: When Protector would take any amount of damage, spend a [mental] resource → reduce that amount by 1. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "You wanna kill me? You better do it quick..."
name: Victor Mancha
text: Reduce the amount of damage Victor Mancha takes from each attack by 1.

name: Flow Like Water
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Response: After you play a [[Defense]] card, deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Defiance
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When a boost card on an enemy attacking you would be turned faceup, discard it instead.

name: Machine Man
text: Interrupt: When Machine Man attacks or thwarts, spend up to 3 resources of any type → Machine Man gets +1 THW and +1 ATK for each resource spent this way.

flavor: "Uh, have you tried turning the power off and back on?" - Ironheart
name: Reboot
text: Action: Ready a friendly [[Android]] character and heal 1 damage from it.

name: Assault Training
text: Max 2 per deck. Uses (2 training counters) Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust this card and remove 1 training counter from it → choose an Aggression (red) event in your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Chance Encounter
text: Attach to a side scheme. Max 1 per scheme. Interrupt: When attached side scheme is defeated, search your deck and discard pile for an ally and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Joining Forces
text: Alliance. (The players can pay this card's costs as a group.) Hero Action: As a group, the players put a total of 1 [[Avenger]] ally and 1 [[Guardian]] ally into play from their hand(s).

name: Meditation
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust your alter-ego → play a card from your hand, reducing its resource cost by 3.
